link.name: Github Release Modern Variant APK (File Download Link)
Github Release Legacy Variant APK(File Download Link)

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 修复 在文件夹页面中更改排序顺序后偶尔内容不正确
  2. 修复 加载不存在的文件歌词时崩溃
  3. 移除 选项 图片预加载
  4. 修改 页码显示设置显示图标
  5. 改进 提高图像加载性能
  6. 改进 支持文件夹页面的自定义网格大小和布局
  7. 开发 清理代码
releaseNote.en:
1. Fix: occasionally incorrect folder content after changing sort order in Folders Page
  2. Fix: crash when loading lyric for nonexistent file
  3. Remove: preference Preload Images
  4. Modify: replace icon for display page settings
  5. Improvement: improve performance of image loading
  6. Improvement: support custom grid size and layout for Folders Page
  7. Development: cleanup codes

link.name: Github Release Modern Variant APK (File Download Link)
Github Release Legacy Variant APK(File Download Link)

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 修复 加载部分文件图片时出现的大量内部错误通知
  2. 修复 在某些情况下替换播放队列后可能崩溃
releaseNote.en:
1. Fix: flooding internal error notifications, due to image loading for certain files
  2. Fix: possible crashes after replacing playing queue on some circumstance
